content:
Within NATO, the Alliance is analyzing different concepts regarding the threats of Russian missiles, in particular, they consider killing such rockets when they are very close to the border of NATO member country.

About thistoldPolish Deputy Foreign Minister Andrzej Sheina on March 26, 2024 on Polish RMF24 Radio.

At the same time, he emphasized that then such decisions on beating should be consistent with Ukraine.

"But this should happen with the consent of the Ukrainian side and taking into account international consequences - because NATO missiles would impress Russian missiles outside NATO," Andrzej Sheina said.

As reported by the Armyinform, Polandwill requireexplanations from Russia through a rocket that disrupted the airspace.
title: NATO is considering the ability to knock Russian missiles
description: The Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs of Poland Andrzej Shane told this on March 26, 2024 ...
author: Army Inform
